deity.name: Ondisso
deity.description: Ondisso is an agathion empyreal lord
deity.source: Paizo Publishing - Inner Sea Gods, p.322

skills.list_mods: Escape Artist +20, Knowledge (Religion) +8, Perception +2, Sense Motive +16, Spellcraft +9, Stealth +7

checklist.name: Lay on Hands (Su)
checklist.description: You can heal wounds (your own or those of others) by touch. Each day you can use this ability 14 times per day. With one use of this ability, you can heal 6d6 hit points of damage. Using this ability is a standard action, unless you target yourself, in which case it is a swift action. Despite the name of this ability, you only need one free hand to use this ability. Alternatively, you can use this healing power to deal damage to undead creatures, dealing 6d6 points of damage. Using Lay in Hands in this way requires a melee touch attack and doesn't provide an attack of opportunity. Undead to not receive a saving throw against this damage.

subability.name: Channel Positive Energy
subability.description: You can unleash a wave of positive energy dealing 7d6 (DC 20 for half) /day. You can unleash a wave of positive energy. You must choose to deal 7d6 points of positive energy damage to undead creatures or to heal living creatures of 7d6 points of damage. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a DC 20 Will save to halve the damage. Using this ability consumes two uses of her lay on hands ability.

checklist.name: Smite Evil (Su)
checklist.description: You can call out to the powers of good to aid you in your struggle against evil 4 times per day. As a swift action, you choose one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, you add +4 to your attack rolls and +12 to all damage rolls made against the target of your smite. If the target of Smite Evil is an outsider with the evil subtype, an evil-aligned dragon, or an undead creature, the bonus to damage on the first successful attack increases to +24. Regardless of the target, Smite Evil attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while smite evil is in effect, you gain a +4 deflection bonus to your AC against attacks made by the target of the smite. If you target a creature that is not evil, the smite is wasted with no effect. The Smite Evil effect remains until the target of the smite is dead or the next time you rest and regain your uses of this ability.

item.name: Darklands Goggles
item.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Ultimate Equipment, p.224

item.source: Custom - Paizo Publishing LLC - Ultimate Equipment, p.10

feat.name: Alignment Channel (Evil)
feat.description: You can channel your divine energy to harm or heal outsiders that possess your chosen alignment subtype.
feat.benefit: Instead of its normal effect, you can choose to have your ability to channel energy heal or harm outsiders of the chosen alignment subtype. You must make this choice each time you channel energy. If you choose to heal or harm creatures of the chosen alignment subtype, your channel energy has no effect on other creatures. The amount of damage healed or dealt and the DC to halve the damage is otherwise unchanged.

feat.name: Extra Channel
feat.description: You can channel divine energy more often.
feat.benefit: You can channel energy two additional times per day.

feat.name: Fey Foundling
feat.description: You were found in the wilds as a child, bearing a mark of the First World. Magical healing works better on you.
feat.benefit: You were found in the wilds as a child, bearing a mark of the First World. Your strange connection to the First World and the fey infuses you with life, and whenever you receive magical healing, you heal an additional 2 points/die rolled. You gain a +2 bonus on all saving throws against death effects. Unfortunately, you also suffer +1 point of damage from cold iron weapons (although you can wield cold iron weapons without significant discomfort).
feat.source: Paizo Inc. - Inner Sea World Guide, p.286

feat.name: Piranha Strike
feat.description: You make a combination of quick strikes, sacrificing accuracy for multiple, minor wounds that prove exceptionally deadly.
feat.source: Paizo Inc. - Sargava, the Lost Colony, p.24

feat.name: Slashing Grace (Kukri)
feat.description: You can stab your enemies with your sword or another slashing weapon.
feat.benefit: Choose one kind of light or one-handed slashing weapon (such as the longsword). When wielding your chosen weapon one-handed, you can treat it as a one-handed piercing melee weapon for all feats and class abilities that require such a weapon (such as a swashbuckler's or a duelist's precise strike) and you can add your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier to that weapon's damage. The weapon must be one appropriate for your size. You do not gain this benefit while fighting with two weapons or using flurry of blows, or any time another hand is otherwise occupied
feat.source: Paizo Publishing - Advanced Class Guide, p.000

feat.name: Weapon Finesse
feat.description: You are trained in using your agility in melee combat, as opposed to brute strength.
feat.benefit: With a light weapon, rapier, whip, or spiked chain made for a creature of your size category, you may use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls. If you carry a shield, its armor check penalty applies to your attack rolls.

feat.name: Weapon Focus (Kukri)
feat.description: You are especially good at using your chosen weapon.
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus on all attack rolls you make using the selected weapon.

archetype.name: Oath against Undeath
archetype.description: You vow to restore the natural state of death to any animate corpse you encounter, and destroy the undead energy in the process.

special_quality.name: Aura of Courage (Su)
special_quality.description: You are immune to fear (magical or otherwise). Each ally within 10 feet of you gains a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects. This ability functions only while you are conscious, not if you are unconscious or dead.

special_quality.name: Aura of Good (Ex)
special_quality.description: You project an overwhelming good aura.

special_quality.name: Aura of Life (Su)
special_quality.description: You gain a +4 morale bonus on saves against attacks that grant negative levels and saves to overcome negative levels. Each ally within 10 feet of you gains a +2 morale bonus on these saves. This ability functions only while you are conscious, not if you are unconscious or dead.

special_quality.name: Mercy (Blinded) (Su)
special_quality.description: Whenever you use Lay on Hands to heal damage to one target, the target is no longer blinded.

special_quality.name: Celestial Spirit (Sp)
special_quality.description: Your divine bond allows you to enhance your weapon as a standard action by calling upon the aid of a celestial spirit for 12 minutes. When called, the spirit causes the weapon to shed light as a torch. This spirit grants the weapon a +3 enhancement bonus. This bonus can be added to the weapon, stacking with existing weapon bonuses to a maximum of +5, or it can be used to add any of the following weapon properties: defending, flaming, keen, merciful (+1), axiomatic, disruption, flaming burst, holy (+2), speed (+3), and brilliant energy (+4). Adding these properties consumes an amount of bonus equal to the property's cost. These bonuses are added to any properties the weapon already has, but duplicate abilities do not stack. If the weapon is not magical, at least a +1 enhancement bonus must be added before any other properties can be added. The bonus and properties granted by the spirit are determined when the spirit is called and cannot be changed until the spirit is called again. The celestial spirit imparts no bonuses if the weapon is held by anyone other than you but resumes giving bonuses if returned to you. These bonuses apply to only one end of a double weapon. You can use this ability 2 times per day. If a weapon bonded with a celestial spirit is destroyed, you lose the use of this ability for 30 days, or until you gain a level, whichever comes first. During this 30-day period, you take a -1 penalty on attack and weapon damage rolls.

special_quality.name: Code of Conduct
special_quality.description: Destroy all undead. Put to rest the poor souls turned against their will. Prevent the taint of undeath from spreading to the newly dead, blessing or burning the corpses as necessary.

special_quality.name: Detect Undead (Su)
special_quality.description: This ability works like the standard paladin ability to detect evil, except as detect undead instead of detect evil.

special_quality.name: Divine Health (Ex)
special_quality.description: You are immune to all diseases, including supernatural and magical diseases, including mummy rot.

special_quality.name: Ghost Touch Aura (Su)
special_quality.description: Your armor and shield are treated as if they had the ghost touch armor property. This does not affect the cost or effect of any other abilities of the armor or shield.

special_quality.name: Keen Senses (Ex)
special_quality.description: Vishkanya receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

special_quality.name: Lay on Hands (Su)
special_quality.description: You can heal wounds (your own or those of others) by touch. Each day you can use this ability 14 times per day. With one use of this ability, you can heal 6d6 hit points of damage. Using this ability is a standard action, unless you target yourself, in which case it is a swift action. Despite the name of this ability, you only need one free hand to use this ability. Alternatively, you can use this healing power to deal damage to undead creatures, dealing 6d6 points of damage. Using Lay in Hands in this way requires a melee touch attack and doesn't provide an attack of opportunity. Undead to not receive a saving throw against this damage.
special_quality.aspect: CheckCount: 14, CheckType: Uses per Day, MasterAbility: Lay on Hands

special_quality.name: Limber (Ex)
special_quality.description: Vishkanya gain a +2 racial bonus on Escape Artist and Stealth checks.

special_quality.name: Low-Light Vision (Ex)
special_quality.description: You can see x2 as far as humans in low illumination. Characters with low-light vision have eyes that are so sensitive to light that they can see twice as far as normal in dim light. Low-Light Vision is color vision. A spellcaster with low-light vision can read a scroll as long as even the tiniest candle flame is next to her as a source of light. Characters with low-light vision can see outdoors on a moonlit night as well as they can during the day.

special_quality.name: Poison Resistance (Ex)
special_quality.description: A vishkanya has a +13 racial bonus on saves against poison.

special_quality.name: Superior Channeler (Su)
special_quality.description: You can channel positive energy to harm undead by expending a single usage of your lay on hands ability instead of two.

special_quality.name: Toxic (Ex)
special_quality.description: A vishkanya can envenom a weapon 2/day with its toxic saliva or blood (using blood requires the vishkanya to be injured when it uses this ability). Applying venom in this way is a swift action. Vishkanya venom: save Fort DC 18; freq 1/rd for 6 rds; effect 1d2 Dex; cure 1 save.

special_quality.name: Vindicator's Shield (Su)
special_quality.description: A vindicator can channel energy into his shield as a standard action; when worn, the shield gives the vindicator a sacred bonus (if positive energy) or profane bonus (if negative energy) to his Armor Class equal to the number of dice of the vindicator's channel energy. This bonus lasts for 24 hours or until the vindicator is struck in combat, whichever comes first. The shield does not provide this bonus to any other wielder, but the vindicator does not need to be holding the shield for it to retain this power.

special_quality.name: Weapon Familiarity (Ex)
special_quality.description: Vishkanya are proficient with blowguns, kukri, and shuriken.

special_attack.name: Channel Positive Energy (Su)
special_attack.description: You can unleash a wave of positive energy dealing 7d6 (DC 20 for half) /day. You can unleash a wave of positive energy. You must choose to deal 7d6 points of positive energy damage to undead creatures or to heal living creatures of 7d6 points of damage. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a DC 20 Will save to halve the damage. Using this ability consumes two uses of her lay on hands ability.
special_attack.aspect: Ability Benefit: (7d6, DC 20), ChildAbility: Lay on Hands

special_attack.name: Poison Use (Ex)
special_attack.description: Vishkanyas are skilled in the use of poison and never accidentally poison themselves when using or applying poison.

special_attack.name: Smite Evil (Su)
special_attack.description: You can call out to the powers of good to aid you in your struggle against evil 4 times per day. As a swift action, you choose one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, you add +4 to your attack rolls and +12 to all damage rolls made against the target of your smite. If the target of Smite Evil is an outsider with the evil subtype, an evil-aligned dragon, or an undead creature, the bonus to damage on the first successful attack increases to +24. Regardless of the target, Smite Evil attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while smite evil is in effect, you gain a +4 deflection bonus to your AC against attacks made by the target of the smite. If you target a creature that is not evil, the smite is wasted with no effect. The Smite Evil effect remains until the target of the smite is dead or the next time you rest and regain your uses of this ability.

trait.name: Lessons of Faith
trait.description: You have a knack for avoiding trouble.

trait.name: Reactionary
trait.description: You were bullied often as a child, but never quite developed an offensive response. Instead, you became adept at anticipating sudden attacks and reacting to danger quickly. You gain a +2 trait bonus on Initiative checks.
trait.source: Paizo Inc. - Second Darkness Player's Guide, p.11

character.weapon_proficiencies: Aldori Dueling Sword, Amentum, Amentum (Javelin), Atlatl, Axe (Throwing), Bardiche, Battle Aspergillum, Battleaxe, Bayonet, Bec de Corbin, Bill, Blowgun, Boar Spear, Brass Knuckles, Broadsword (Nine Ring), Butterfly Sword, Cestus, Chakram, Club, Crossbow (Heavy), Crossbow (Light), Dagger, Dagger (Chain), Dagger (Punching), Dart, Dogslicer, Double Chicken Saber, Earth Breaker, Falchion, Flail, Flail (Heavy), Gaff, Gauntlet, Gauntlet (Spiked), Gladius, Glaive, Glaive-Guisarme, Grapple, Great Terbutje, Greataxe, Greatclub, Greatsword, Guisarme, Halberd, Hammer (Light), Handaxe, Hooked Lance, Horsechopper, Hunga Munga, Iron Brush, Javelin, Jutte, Katana, Kerambit, Klar, Kukri, Lance, Longbow, Longspear, Longsword, Lucerne Hammer, Lungchuan Tamo, Mace (Heavy), Mace (Light), Mattock, Mere Club, Monk's Spade, Morningstar, Naginata, Nodachi, Ogre Hook, Pick (Heavy), Pick (Light), Pilum, Poisoned Sand Tube, Quarterstaff, Ranseur, Rapier, Rhomphaia, Rock, Sansetsukon, Sap, Scimitar, Scizore, Scythe, Sea-Knife, Shang Gou, Shieldbash, Shortbow, Shortspear, Shuriken, Sibat, Sickle, Sling, Spear, Spear (Boar), Spells (Ray), Spells (Touch), Spiked Armor, Splash Weapon, Stake, Starknife, Sword (Bastard), Sword (Short), Sword (Tri-Point Double-Edged), Sword Cane, Tepoztopilli, Terbutje, Tiger Fork, Tonfa, Trident, Tube Arrow Shooter, Unarmed Strike, Underwater Crossbow (Heavy), Underwater Crossbow (Light), War Razor, Waraxe (Dwarven), Warhammer, Wushu Dart

spell.name: Abstemiousness
spell.effect: This spell magically enhances a handful of simple food, imbuing it with enough nutrition to satisfy a Medium or smaller creature for a full day. The spell does not create food, and thus will not alone prevent someone from starving, but it can extend even limited reserves for lengthy periods.
spell.target: a handful of berries, grains, nuts, or rice

source.source: Paizo Publishing - Inner Sea Gods, p.??

spell.description: This spell magically enhances a handful of simple food, imbuing it with enough nutrition to satisfy a Medium or smaller creature for a full day. The spell does not create food, and thus will not alone prevent someone from starving, but it can extend even limited reserves for lengthy periods.

spell.name: Bless
spell.effect: Bless fills your allies with courage.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: Bless fills your allies with courage.

spell.name: Bless Water
spell.effect: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.
spell.description: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.

spell.name: Bless Weapon
spell.effect: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.
spell.description: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.

spell.name: Bowstaff
spell.effect: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.
spell.description: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.

spell.name: Challenge Evil
spell.effect: Sickens creature if it refuses to fight you.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.210

spell.description: Sickens creature if it refuses to fight you.

spell.name: Compel Hostility
spell.components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood)
spell.effect: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.
spell.description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

spell.name: Create Water
spell.effect: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.
spell.description: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.

spell.name: Cure Light Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+5 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.
spell.target: Or Area one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.effect: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.
spell.description: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.

spell.name: Diagnose Disease
spell.effect: Detect and identify diseases.
spell.target: One creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: Detect and identify diseases.

spell.name: Divine Favor
spell.effect: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +3 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.
spell.description: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +(max(1,min(3,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3)))) luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.

spell.name: Endure Elements
spell.effect: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.
spell.description: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.

spell.name: Enhance Water
spell.effect: Transform water into an alcoholic beverage, typically ale, beer, mead, or wine.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Faiths of Purity, p.28

spell.description: Transform water into an alcoholic beverage, typically ale, beer, mead, or wine.

spell.name: Ghostbane Dirge
spell.components: V, S, M/DF (an old reed from a wind instrument)
spell.effect: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.225

spell.description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

spell.name: Grace
spell.effect: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

spell.name: Haze of Dreams
spell.effect: You fill an enemy's head with waking dreams, reducing the target's speet by half.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Faiths of Purity, p.28

spell.description: You fill an enemy's head with waking dreams, reducing the target's speet by half.

spell.name: Hero's Defiance
spell.effect: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

spell.name: Honeyed Tongue
spell.effect: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.228

spell.description: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

spell.name: Horn of Pursuit
spell.effect: Create three notes heard miles away.
spell.description: Create three notes heard miles away.

spell.name: Knight's Calling
spell.effect: Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.230

spell.description: Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

spell.name: Know the Enemy
spell.effect: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.
spell.description: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.

spell.name: Liberating Command
spell.effect: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.
spell.description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

spell.name: Litany of Sloth
spell.effect: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.
spell.description: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

spell.name: Longshot
spell.components: V, S, M/DF (a piece of fletching)
spell.effect: Grants a +10 foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.
spell.description: Grants a +10 foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

spell.name: Magic Weapon
spell.effect: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.
spell.description: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

spell.name: Protection from Chaos
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Protection from Evil
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Rally Point
spell.effect: Square gives good creatures bonuses.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.237

spell.description: Square gives good creatures bonuses.

spell.name: Read Magic
spell.effect: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.
spell.description: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.

spell.name: Resistance
spell.effect: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
spell.description: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

spell.name: Restoration (Lesser)
spell.effect: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.
spell.description: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.

spell.name: Stalwart Resolve
spell.effect: Stalwart resolve was originally created to temporarily aid those suffering from certain afflictions. The recipient of stalwart resolve ignores the effects of ability damage and penalties to a single ability score of your choice, except that damage equal to or greater than the ability score still causes unconsciousness or death. This applies whether or not the ability damage or penalty happened before or during the spell's duration, and whether or not multiple sources are involved. This spell has no effect on ability drain.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Pathfinder Society Field Guide, p.58

spell.description: Stalwart resolve was originally created to temporarily aid those suffering from certain afflictions. The recipient of stalwart resolve ignores the effects of ability damage and penalties to a single ability score of your choice, except that damage equal to or greater than the ability score still causes unconsciousness or death. This applies whether or not the ability damage or penalty happened before or during the spell's duration, and whether or not multiple sources are involved. This spell has no effect on ability drain.

spell.name: Tactical Acumen
spell.components: V, S, M/DF (a small piece of a map)
spell.effect: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 30-ft.-radius burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

spell.name: Unbreakable Heart
spell.effect: Creature gains +4 morale bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects that rely on negative emotions or that would force him to harm an ally. Supresses such effects already in place.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Inner Sea World Guide, p.296

spell.description: Creature gains +4 morale bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects that rely on negative emotions or that would force him to harm an ally. Supresses such effects already in place.

spell.name: Veil of Positive Energy
spell.effect: +2 AC, +2 on saves vs. undead.
spell.target: You or all creatures within 5 ft.; see text

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.254

spell.description: +2 AC, +2 on saves vs. undead.

spell.name: Virtue
spell.effect: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.
spell.description: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.

spell.name: Wartrain Mount
spell.effect: Animal gains combat training.
spell.description: Animal gains combat training.

spell.name: Weapons Against Evil
spell.effect: Target weapons shed light and ignore the DR of some evil creatures.
spell.target: 9 weapons, no two of which can be more than 20 ft. apart

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Faiths of Purity, p.29

spell.description: Target weapons shed light and ignore the DR of some evil creatures.

spell.name: Word of Resolve
spell.effect: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.
spell.description: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.

spell.name: Sanctify Corpse
spell.effect: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.
spell.description: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.

spell.name: Arrow of Law
spell.effect: Harm and possibly daze chaotic creatures.
spell.description: Harm and possibly daze chaotic creatures.

spell.name: Aura of Greater Courage
spell.effect: Increases strength of a paladin's aura of courage.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.204

spell.description: Increases strength of a paladin's aura of courage.

spell.name: Bestow Grace
spell.effect: Subject gains bonus on saving throws equal to Cha modifier.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.205

spell.description: Subject gains bonus on saving throws equal to Cha modifier.

spell.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
spell.components: V, S, M (pieces of shaved metal)
spell.effect: Grant a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.
spell.description: Grant a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

spell.name: Blessing of Courage and Life
spell.effect: Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.205

spell.description: Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.

spell.name: Bull's Strength
spell.effect: The subject becomes stronger granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.
spell.description: The subject becomes stronger granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.

spell.name: Corruption Resistance
spell.effect: Protects creature against damage from alignment-based attacks.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.212

spell.description: Protects creature against damage from alignment-based attacks.

spell.name: Delay Poison
spell.effect: The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison.
spell.description: The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison.

spell.name: Divine Arrow
spell.effect: Imbues a projectile with holy energy.
spell.description: Imbues a projectile with holy energy.

spell.name: Eagle's Splendor
spell.effect: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
spell.description: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

spell.name: Effortless Armor
spell.effect: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.
spell.description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

spell.name: Endure Elements (Communal)
spell.effect: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
spell.description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spell.name: Fire of Entanglement
spell.effect: Your ability to smite evil also entangles your foe.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.221

spell.description: Your ability to smite evil also entangles your foe.

spell.name: Holy Shield
spell.effect: Lend your shield's protection to another.
spell.description: Lend your shield's protection to another.

spell.name: Instant Armor
spell.effect: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.229

spell.description: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

spell.name: Light Lance
spell.effect: Creates a soaring beacon of light.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.231

spell.description: Creates a soaring beacon of light.

spell.name: Litany of Defense
spell.effect: Doubles armor's enhancement bonus.
spell.description: Doubles armor's enhancement bonus.

spell.name: Litany of Eloquence
spell.effect: Fascinates a single creature for 1 round.
spell.description: Fascinates a single creature for 1 round.

spell.name: Litany of Entanglement
spell.effect: Entangles a creature for 1 round.
spell.description: Entangles a creature for 1 round.

spell.name: Litany of Righteousness
spell.effect: A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.
spell.description: A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.

spell.name: Litany of Warding
spell.effect: You gain two additional attacks of opportunity for 1 round.
spell.description: You gain two additional attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

spell.name: Magic Siege Engine
spell.effect: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.
spell.description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

spell.name: Owl's Wisdom
spell.effect: The transmuted creature becomes wiser gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
spell.description: The transmuted creature becomes wiser gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

spell.name: Paladin's Sacrifice
spell.effect: Take the damage and effects for another creature.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.234

spell.description: Take the damage and effects for another creature.

spell.name: Protection from Chaos (Communal)
spell.effect: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
spell.description: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spell.name: Protection from Evil (Communal)
spell.effect: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
spell.description: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spell.name: Remove Paralysis
spell.effect: You can free one or more creatures from the effects of temporary paralysis or related magic.
spell.target: Up to four creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: You can free one or more creatures from the effects of temporary paralysis or related magic.

spell.name: Resist Energy
spell.effect: This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select.
spell.description: This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select.

spell.name: Righteous Vigor
spell.effect: Boosts attack bonus with each hit.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.239

spell.description: Boosts attack bonus with each hit.

spell.name: Sacred Bond
spell.components: V, S, F (a pair of golden bracelets worth 100 gp each worn by both you and the target)
spell.effect: Cast touch healing spells from a distance.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.240

spell.description: Cast touch healing spells from a distance.

spell.name: Saddle Surge
spell.effect: Bonus damage for moving on mount.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.240

spell.description: Bonus damage for moving on mount.

spell.name: Shield Other
spell.effect: This spell wards the subject and creates a mystic connection between you and the subject so that some of its wounds are transferred to you.
spell.description: This spell wards the subject and creates a mystic connection between you and the subject so that some of its wounds are transferred to you.

spell.name: Undetectable Alignment
spell.effect: An undetectable alignment spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.
spell.description: An undetectable alignment spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.

spell.name: Vestment of the Champion
spell.effect: Armor or shield gains a +2 enhancement bonus.
spell.description: Armor or shield gains a +(min(CASTERLEVEL/4,5)) enhancement bonus.

spell.name: Wake of Light
spell.effect: Magical trail aids good creatures, hinders evil ones.
spell.target: a 10-ft.-wide path in a straight line, up to 120 ft. long

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.254

spell.description: Magical trail aids good creatures, hinders evil ones.

spell.name: Weapon of Awe
spell.effect: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.256

spell.description: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

spell.name: Zone of Truth
spell.effect: Creatures within the emanation area [or those who enter it] can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies.
spell.description: Creatures within the emanation area (or those who enter it) can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.effect: The subject gains the ability to see 60 feet even in total darkness.
spell.description: The subject gains the ability to see 60 feet even in total darkness.

spell.name: Archon's Aura
spell.effect: Aura penalizes enemy attacks and AC.
spell.description: Aura penalizes enemy attacks and AC.

spell.name: Blade of Bright Victory
spell.effect: Bonded weapon gains ghost touch.
spell.description: Bonded weapon gains ghost touch.

spell.name: Blessing of the Mole
spell.effect: 9 allies gain darkvision and a +2 Stealth bonus.
spell.description: (CASTERLEVEL) allies gain darkvision and a +2 Stealth bonus.

spell.name: Burst of Speed
spell.effect: You gain increased speed, and your movement ignores attacks of opportunity and allows you to move through the space of creatures larger than you are.
spell.description: You gain increased speed, and your movement ignores attacks of opportunity and allows you to move through the space of creatures larger than you are.

spell.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+9 points of damage.
spell.saveinfo: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+(min(10,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Daybreak Arrow
spell.effect: Targeted ammunition exudes radiant energy.
spell.target: up to 50 pieces of ammunition, all of which must be together at the time of casting
spell.description: Targeted ammunition exudes radiant energy.

spell.name: Daylight
spell.effect: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.
spell.description: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.

spell.name: Deadly Juggernaut
spell.effect: Your might increases with every kill you make.
spell.description: Your might increases with every kill you make.

spell.name: Delay Poison (Communal)
spell.effect: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
spell.description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spell.name: Discern Lies
spell.effect: You know if the target deliberately and knowingly speaks a lie by discerning disturbances in its aura caused by lying.
spell.target: 9 creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: You know if the target deliberately and knowingly speaks a lie by discerning disturbances in its aura caused by lying.

spell.name: Dispel Magic
spell.effect: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object, to temporarily suppress the magical abilities of a magic item, or to counter another spellcaster's spell.
spell.description: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object, to temporarily suppress the magical abilities of a magic item, or to counter another spellcaster's spell.

spell.name: Divine Transfer
spell.effect: Transfer hit points and give DR/evil to target creature.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.216

spell.description: Transfer hit points and give DR/evil to target creature.

spell.name: Fire of Judgment
spell.effect: Smited creature takes damage when it attacks.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.221

spell.description: Smited creature takes damage when it attacks.

spell.name: Ghostbane Dirge, Mass
spell.components: V, S, M/DF (an old reed from a wind instrument)
spell.effect: As ghostbane dirge, but affecting multiple creatures.
spell.target: 9 incorporeal creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.225

spell.description: As ghostbane dirge, but affecting multiple creatures.

spell.name: Heal Mount
spell.effect: This spell functions like heal, but it affects only the paladin's special mount [typically a horse].
spell.description: This spell functions like heal, but it affects only the paladin's special mount (typically a horse).

spell.name: Holy Whisper
spell.effect: Whisper sickens evil creatures, gives good creatures bonuses.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.228

spell.description: Whisper sickens evil creatures, gives good creatures bonuses.

spell.name: Litany of Escape
spell.effect: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.
spell.target: one willing creature that is grappled
spell.description: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.

spell.name: Litany of Sight
spell.effect: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.
spell.description: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.

spell.name: Magic Circle against Chaos
spell.effect: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from chaos spell, and chaotic summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.
spell.description: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from chaos spell, and chaotic summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.

spell.name: Magic Circle against Evil
spell.effect: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from evil spell, and evil summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.
spell.description: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from evil spell, and evil summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.

spell.name: Magic Weapon (Greater)
spell.effect: This spell functions like magic weapon, except that it gives a weapon an enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls of +2.
spell.target: One weapon or 50 projectiles [all of which must be together at the time of casting]
spell.description: This spell functions like magic weapon, except that it gives a weapon an enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls of +(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/4))).

spell.name: Marks of Forbiddance
spell.effect: Makes 2 creatures pass Will saves in order to attack each other.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.232

spell.description: Makes 2 creatures pass Will saves in order to attack each other.

spell.name: Prayer
spell.effect: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies.
spell.target: All allies and foes within a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on you
spell.description: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies.

spell.name: Remove Blindness/Deafness
spell.effect: Remove blindness/deafness cures blindness or deafness.
spell.description: Remove blindness/deafness cures blindness or deafness.

spell.name: Remove Curse
spell.effect: Remove curse can remove all curses on an object or a creature.
spell.description: Remove curse can remove all curses on an object or a creature.

spell.name: Resist Energy (Communal)
spell.effect: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
spell.description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spell.name: Sanctify Armor
spell.effect: +2 AC.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.240

spell.description: +(min((CASTERLEVEL/4),5)) AC.

spell.name: Wrathful Mantle
spell.effect: Subject shines and gets 2 on all saves.
spell.target: creature touched or all creatures within 5 ft.; see text

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.257

spell.description: Subject shines and gets (CASTERLEVEL/4) on all saves.

spell.name: Searing Light
spell.effect: Focusing divine power like a ray of the sun, you project a blast of light from your open palm dealing 4d8 points of damage.
spell.description: Focusing divine power like a ray of the sun, you project a blast of light from your open palm dealing (min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/2)))d8 points of damage.

spell.name: Halt Undead
spell.effect: This spell renders as many as three undead creatures immobile.
spell.target: Up to three undead creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: This spell renders as many as three undead creatures immobile.

spell.name: Grace
spell.effect: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

spell.name: Hero's Defiance
spell.effect: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

spell.name: Aura of Greater Courage
spell.effect: Increases strength of a paladin's aura of courage.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.204

spell.description: Increases strength of a paladin's aura of courage.

spell.name: Litany of Righteousness
spell.effect: A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.
spell.description: A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.

spell.name: Paladin's Sacrifice
spell.effect: Take the damage and effects for another creature.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.234

spell.description: Take the damage and effects for another creature.

spell.name: Litany of Escape
spell.effect: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.
spell.target: one willing creature that is grappled
spell.description: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.

spell.name: Litany of Sight
spell.effect: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.
spell.description: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.
